website_summaries.verdict: The great role models of female super heroes decorate this comforter, but the fit isn't so super.
pros: This set is of great quality, it feels super soft, and the color won't fade in the wash
cons: The stuffing shifts in the wash, making the comforter appear wrinkly, and while it says it fits both twin- and full-size beds, it is best for twin

customer_reviews.title: Cute but damaged after washing once
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it but after washing once per instructions the purple bed on to the pink and the stuffing has shifted making it really wrinkly. If she didn't love it, I would definitely return it.
customer_reviews.author: wsukellie

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic comforter
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter 8 months ago for a gift. She absolutely loves it! Great material and the colors stay vibrant even after several washes.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect my daughter loved it and it washes just fin, so far colors have not faded or stained
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this purchase. It was perfect and washed well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimmykakesketo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if it hadn't taken months to ship
customer_reviews.text: It took FOREVER for this to arrive and it missed Christmas by a long shot. But the sheets are super soft and look great! The kid loves them too.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely wonderful, my daughter was overjoyed by it, and the colors haven't faded with washing.
customer_reviews.author: Cblack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover. Soft and granddaughter loved it. Well made and vivid colors.
customer_reviews.author: totoz

customer_reviews.title: Great Bedspread
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bedspread. It looks even better than the picture. This is great for a young girl that loves superheros.
customer_reviews.author: Loveday

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Hasn't faded and I've washed twice. My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Sepulveda

customer_reviews.title: Super hero
customer_reviews.text: This must be a very popular item. It took forever for this product to be in stock. However, I was able to purchase one quickly. Although the comforter was very nice, I feel like there could have been more that came in the package. It would have been nice for the sheets or pillow cases to be included. I had to buy everything separately, which I was okay doing but it just wasn't fun receiving one product and having to wait for another product to come in, especially if you could not give both presents at the same time. Other than that great product
customer_reviews.author: Ling Ling

customer_reviews.title: Soft, cute, not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It's super soft and is so cute! The kids love it! Apparently you can't comment on price here, but you may want to price check to save your wallet. This isn't worth almost $50...just a hint. It's probably worth $29 at most. 2 stars for quality that doesn't match the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jillicious

product_meta.title: Warner Bros. DC Super Heroes Girls Cosmic Comforter, Twin/Full
product_meta.description: This fun, colorful Warner Bros DC super hero girls cosmic girls Twin/full comforter. This 72x86 inches comforter fits both a standard Twin or full size bed. This comforter features wonder woman, Harley Quinn, batgirl and super girl on a vibrant back ground. Made of soft 100percent polyester microfiber. Machine wash cold, use non-chlorine bleach is needed. Tumble dry low, remove promptly. Do not iron.
feature_bullets: Package includes one 72x86 inches Twin/full comforter
This comforter features Wonder Woman, Harley quinn, batgirl and super girl
This comforter fits both a standard Twin or full size bed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars36 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
